Entries.spring: 610 Custom_ESVetHouse 30 14 1/700 Custom_EastScarpe 42 40 2/730 Town 100 95 1 "Strings\schedules\Eloise:tuesday.005"/930 SamHouse 3 13 2 Eloise_read "Strings\schedules\Eloise:tuesday.001"/1400 Town 15 72 0 "Strings\schedules\Eloise:tuesday.002"/1700 SamHouse 4 8 0 "Strings\schedules\Eloise:tuesday.003"/1900 SamHouse 3 13 2 Eloise_read

Entries.Eloise: I love the rain, don't you? Dad doesn't even mind if I stomp in puddles - as long as I wear my gumboots!
Entries.Jacob: Ellie gets so restless on rainy days, she hates being confined indoors. Between her and Pepper... well, let's just say I spend a lot of time mopping!

Entries.VetHouse.01: Sir Flufflekins the first wrinkles his nose and regards you suspiciously.
Entries.VetHouse.03: They're all postmarked from the Gotoro Republic. Eloise must write to a friend there.
Entries.VetHouse.04: A selection of beautifully illustrated books about the flora and fauna of Stardew Valley.
Entries.VetHouse.05: Looks like this chair's taken! Her Ladyship Princess Midnight the Third eyes you regally. You feel judged, and found wanting.
Entries.VetHouse.06: Tiny colorful fish. It's very clean, but perhaps a little small? The fish seem restless.
Entries.VetHouse.07: It's tuned to the natural history channel. There's a documentary playing on birds of the rainforest.
Entries.VetHouse.08: It's filled with women's clothing, all neatly folded and packed with tissue paper. Either Dr. Jacob has diverse tastes, or they belonged to his wife.
Entries.VetHouse.09: Very neatly organized, there's a full set of the Ferngill enclyopedias, plus textbooks on animal anatomy and behaviour.
Entries.VetHouse.10: Ah, here's where all the paperbacks are hiding: From thrillers, to horror, historic fiction and even a couple of romances; it's an eclectic range.
Entries.VetHouse.11: Eloise's taste range from animal stories to tales of children solving mysteries. They're in surprisingly good condition.
Entries.VetHouse.12: 'The Mona Lisa Enigma': obviously Dr Jacob indulges in fast-paced crime thrillers.
Entries.VetHouse.13: The plants all look well cared for. And what was that skittering across the soil, a lizard?
Entries.VetHouse.14: A large raccoon studies you warily. Its ears are tattered, like it's been in a fight with something.
Entries.VetHouse.15: The screensaver shows a dark-haired woman and a toddler with pigtails. His wife and Eloise, you assume.
Entries.VetHouse.16: Dr. Jacob's workbook:^There has been an increase in small animals brought in with contusions and crushed bones, suggesting the presence of predators in the area.

Entries.ellie.000: Hear that noisy bird? It's a jerjar bird! He's my friend.$4

When.DayofWeek: Monday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday

pause 500/jump Jacob 3/speak Jacob "I mean, yes. Yes. I'd be delighted to go out with you."/pause 500/emote Jacob 28/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Jacob "I'm not ready for a longterm commitment, and you do understand I can't leave the farm though, don't you? Or Ellie?"/question fork0 "...#I'm fine with that. As long as I can come visit you!#You mean we can't marry? Oh, maybe I should reconsider."/fork Jacob_PsuedoDateYes/pause 500/speak Jacob "I understand. I'm a little disappointed, yes. But I understand.#$b#Now, did you want to try the dessert.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/faceDirection Jacob 0/fade/viewport -100 -100/message "The melon cake is pretty good too, and the evening is most enjoyable."/pause 1000/end warpOut

Entries.57870006/f Jacob 1000/f Clint 1000/t 180: nightTime/91 83/Jacob 93 82 1 Clint 94 82 3 farmer 85 89 1/skippable/pause 500/speak Clint "...look, I just don't want to, okay. Why are you even here?$2#$b#Aren't there animals or something that are more worthy of your attention?$3"/faceDirection Clint 0/emote Clint 12/pause 500/warp Clint -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/emote Jacob 60/pause 1000/pause 1000/move Jacob 1 0 0/emote Jacob 40/pause 2000/textAboveHead Jacob "I'm sorry..."/pause 1000/faceDirection Jacob 2/move Jacob -1 0 2/move Jacob 0 7 2 true/viewport move 0 2 1000 true/move farmer 7 0 1 true/pause 4000/faceDirection Jacob 3/jump Jacob 5/speak Jacob "Oh, you startled me, @."/quickQuestion #What was that about?#Sorry to startle you.#Pleasant evening, isn't it?"(break)speak Jacob "Oh... you heard? Just family business.$2"(break)speak Jacob "Oh, it's fine... I guess I'm just a bit jumpy tonight.$2"(break)speak Jacob "Um yes, I suppose... I hadn't really noticed.$2"/pause 500/emote Jacob 40/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Jacob "Anyhow, I shouldn't keep you. Best be going. Animals to tend to...$2#$b#Take care, @."/speed Jacob 2/move Jacob 0 5 1 true/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/end

Entries.Town_88_103: Hello farmer @! I'm helping Randy with his reading.#$b#(whispers) But I'm not sure he really understands how books work.$1

Entries.Town_87_103: Hi! Ellie is new friend! She very smart!#$b#But sometimes treat Randy like me stupid.$s#$b#And that make Randy sad. Cos Randy not stupid, no?$2

Entries.Custom_EastScarpe_55_89: Did you know that {{random: if a starfish loses its arm it grows back?, some starfish can release venom so you've got to be careful not to touch them!, starfish eat by pushing their stomach out their mouth and over the prey!, starfish aren't fish at all so the name's silly!, starfish have no brain or blood?, starfish can live for 35 years!}}
Entries.summer_28_2: Are you going to come and see the jellies tonight, @?#$b#Did you know that {{random: jellyfish don't have any brains but can smell and detect light, jellyfish don't poop - they throop!, some jellyfish have nasty stings and can kill you, jellyfish are eaten by lots of sea creatures, some jellyfish live forever by going back to being babies again!}}

Entries.summer_Mon8: I found a really pretty feather for Leo today... I'm going to give it to him in class tomorrow. I really hope he likes it!$1
Entries.Sat10: Do you think Leo likes me?$3#$b#Sometimes I think he likes Jas better...$2
Entries.fall_Tue10: Isn't Leo cool? He can talk to birds! He's amazing.$1
Entries.fall_26: I hope Leo likes my costume for Spirit's Eve tomorrow.$3#$b#You'll be there too, right? Dad always looks forward to seeing you.$1
Entries.summer_12: Leo says the crested flamingos are a bit like the gembirds on his island.#$b#They sound really magical, I wish I could see them.$3

Entries.EloiseQuiet: Eloise usually has all the answers... but she's been very quiet recently. I hope nothing's wrong at home.$2
Do you think Ellie's mad at me, @?
The girls don't want to play with me anymore.$2#$b#And something's made Eloise sad. I told jokes to cheer her up, but it didn't work.$2
Jas and Ellie were best friends... but now Ellie's barely talking.#$b#Do you know what's wrong, @? Did they have some sort of fight?$2

Entries.Mon8: ... I'm quiet as a mouse, farmer @.
Entries.Tue8: ... Vincent keeps telling me jokes. I think he's trying to cheer me up.#$b#It's really hard not to laugh.
Entries.Wed8: ... I've started writing down stuff instead of saying it out loud.#$b#And now I need a new notebook!$1
Entries.Thu8: ... it's really, really hard not to talk all the time.$3
Entries.Fri8: ... I don't think it's working... Leo doesn't seem to want to talk to me anymore.$2
Entries.Sat8: ... I knew the right answer in class yesterday, but I didn't say anything.#$b#Miss Penny looked all frowny.$2
